fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hushed Breath (Day, 3 uses): Freeze a player, immediately stopping them from being able to talk or change their vote for the rest of the day.
- Freeze (Night): Select two players. If one of the other Coven members has either visited or whispered your target, deal an astral Basic attack to them.
- Blanket of Snow (Night, 1 use): Summon a snowstorm tonight. All visits tonight will be redirected to non-Coven members at random. This can only be used when you're in possession of the Necromonicon.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have Basic defense until the first time you're attacked.
- With the Necromonicon, players that visit you are roleblocked a night later.
- You have Necromonicon Priority, and cannot spawn with other Coven Heads or the CL.
